channel.title: Why whonix is using contrib non-free ?
channel.description:
Why Whonix is using contrib non-free packages in their sources.list instead of just
deb http://deb.debian.org/debian stretch main

item.title: Why whonix is using contrib non-free ?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
This was discussed in a recent thread which should answer some (all?) of your questions.

https://forums.whonix.org/t/linux-foundation-craps-whonix-anonymity-dilemma/5279

Read full topic
